name: Acrobat
otherNightReminder: If either good living neighbor is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat dies.
ability: Each night*, if either good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, you die.

name: Al-Hadikhia
otherNightReminder: Wake the Al-Hadikhia and they should point at 3 players. Mark each player.  Publicly announce that for a few minutes, talking is forbidden. In the order chosen, announce that Al-Hadikhia has chosen each player and that they are to either provide a thumb up for alive or a thumb down for death.  If all chose life, all die.  Otherwise, adjust them per their choice.
ability: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
jinx2Text: If there are two living Al-Hadikhias, the Scarlet Woman Al-Hadikhia becomes the Scarlet Woman again.

name: Alchemist
firstNightReminder: Wake the Alchemist and show them a not-in-play Minion.  Replace the Alchemist token with that token and place the Alchemist’s 'Is the Alchemist' reminder by that character token.⬤
ability: You have a not-in-play Minion ability.
jinx1Text: The Alchemist can not have the Spy ability.
jinx2Text: The Alchemist can not have the Widow ability.

name: Amnesiac
firstNightReminder: Determine the ability of the Amnesiac.  Wake them and provide them the information that they learn.  Mark players as needed with the provided tokens.⬤
otherNightReminder: Maintaining the same rule as before, wake the Amnesiac and provide them the information that they learn.  Mark players as needed with the provided tokens.⬤
ability: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

name: Apprentice
firstNightReminder: Wake the Apprentice and show them the 'You are' info token, followed by a Townsfolk or Minion token, as matches their alignment. Replace the Apprentice token with that token and place the Apprentice’s 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.⬤
ability: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).

name: Artist
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

name: Assassin
otherNightReminder: Wake the Assassin and they either shake their head no, or point at any player.  That player dies, ignoring abilities that keep them safe.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

name: Atheist
ability: The Storyteller can break the game rules & if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]

name: Balloonist
firstNightReminder: Wake the Balloonist and point to a character of a type not previously pointed out (Townsfolk, Outsider, Minion, Demon).  Mark that player with the 'Seen' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Balloonist and point to a character of a type not previously pointed out (Townsfolk, Outsider, Minion, Demon).  Mark that player with the 'Seen' reminder token.⬤
ability: Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type, until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]
jinx1Text: If the Marionette thinks they are the Balloonist, +1 Outsider was added.

name: Barber
otherNightReminder: If the Barber dies, wake the Demon and show them the 'This character selected you' info token, then the Barber token. The Demon can either shake their head no or point to two players. Swap those character tokens. Put the Demon to sleep and wake each of those swapped players, showing them the 'You are' info token and their new character token.  Do remind them that their alignment did not change.
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

name: Barista
firstNightReminder: Each night, choose a player and mark them as either 'Sober and Healthy' or 'Acts Twice.'  Wake that player and show them the 'This player selected you' info token, then the Barista token, then either 1 finger, (for Sober and Healthy) or 2 fingers (for Acts Twice). Use the '?' reminders if needed.⬤
otherNightReminder: Each night, choose  player and mark them as either 'Sober and Healthy' or 'Acts Twice.'  Wake that player and show them the 'This player selected you' info token, then the Barista token, then either 1 finger, (for Sober and Healthy) or 2 fingers (for Acts Twice). Use the '?' reminders if needed.⬤
ability: Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy and gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.

name: Baron
ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

name: Beggar
ability: You must use a vote token to vote. Dead players may choose to give you theirs. If so, you learn their alignment.

name: Bishop
ability: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposite player must be nominated each day.

name: Bone Collector
otherNightReminder: After there is at least one dead player, wake the Bone Collector and allow them to choose any dead player or not.  This player now 'Has Ability' for one day and the Bone Collector has 'No Ability' for the rest of the game.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

name: Boomdandy
ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.

name: Bounty Hunter
firstNightReminder: Mark a Townsfolk as Evil.  Wake that Townsfolk and show them the 'You are' info token and the thumb down to inform them that they are evil.  Wake the Bounty Hunter and point to an evil player.  Mark that player with the 'Known' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: If the previously chosen evil player has died today, wake the Bounty Hunter and point to a new evil player.  Mark that player with the 'Known' reminder token.⬤
ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

name: Bureaucrat
firstNightReminder: Wake the Bureaucrat and they should point to a player. Place the '3 Votes' reminder next to the chosen player.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Bureaucrat and they should point to a player. Place the '3 Votes' reminder next to the chosen player.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

name: Butcher
ability: Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.

name: Butler
firstNightReminder: Wake the Butler and they should point to a player. Place the 'Master' reminder token next to the chosen player.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Butler and they should point to a player. Place the 'Master' reminder token next to the chosen player.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
jinx1Text: If the Cannibal gains the Butler ability, the Cannibal learns this.
jinx2Text: The Butler can not nominate their master.
jinx3Text: If the Organ Grinder is causing eyes closed voting, the Butler may raise their hand to vote, but their vote is only counted if their master voted too.

name: Cannibal
ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
jinx1Text: Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Cannibal.

name: Cerenovus
firstNightReminder: Wake the Cerenovus and they should point at any player and any character icon.  Put the 'Mad' reminder token by that player’s character token.  Wake the 'Mad' player, show them the 'This player selected you' info token, then the Cerenovus token, then the Character token for the character they should be mad about being.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Cerenovus and they should point at any player and any character icon.  Put the 'Mad' reminder token by that player’s character token.  Wake the 'Mad' player, show them the 'This player selected you' info token, then the Cerenovus token, then the Character token for the character they should be mad about being.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are 'mad' they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
jinx1Text: The Ceronovus may choose to make a player mad that they they are the Goblin.

name: Chambermaid
firstNightReminder: Wake the Chambermaid and they should point at 2 alive players except themself. Show the Chambermaid fingers (0, 1, or 2) equaling the number of chosen characters who woke or will wake later tonight.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Chambermaid and they should point at 2 alive players except themself. Show the Chambermaid fingers (0, 1, or 2) equaling the number of chosen characters who woke or will wake later tonight.
ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
jinx1Text: The Chambermaid learns if the Mathematician wakes tonight or not, even though the Chambermaid wakes first.

name: Chef
firstNightReminder: Wake the Chef and show them fingers equaling the number of pairs of neighboring evil players.
ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

name: Choirboy
otherNightReminder: If the Demon killed the King, wake the Choirboy and show them the 'This is the Demon' info token and point at the Demon.
ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+ the King]
jinx1Text: If a Riot player nominates and kills the King and the Choirboy is alive, the Choirboy uses their ability tonight.

name: Clockmaker
firstNightReminder: Wake the Clockmaker. Show fingers (1,2,3, etc.) equaling the distance in players from the Demon to the nearest Minion, starting with the player neighboring the Demon closer to that Minion.
ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
jinx1Text: Riot registers as a Minion to the Clockmaker.

name: Courtier
firstNightReminder: Wake the Courtier and they either shake their head no, or point at any character on their character sheet.  The character is poisoned for 3 days.  Use the numbered 'Poisoned' reminders to help remember.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Courtier and they either shake their head no, or point at any character on their character sheet.  The character is poisoned for 3 days.  Use the numbered 'Poisoned' reminders to help remember.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

name: Cult Leader
firstNightReminder: If the Cult Leader changed alignment, wake them and show them the thumb up good signal or the thumb down evil signal accordingly.
otherNightReminder: If the Cult Leader changed alignment, wake them and show them the thumb up good signal or the thumb down evil signal accordingly.
ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbour. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

name: Damsel
firstNightReminder: Wake the Minions.  Show them the Damsel character token. If the Huntsman chose the Damsel, show them the 'You are' info token and their new Townsfolk character token.
otherNightReminder: If the Huntsman chose the Damsel, show them the 'You are' info token and their new Townsfolk character token.
ability: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
jinx1Text: The Marionette does not learn that a Damsel is in play.
jinx2Text: If the Pit-Hag creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.
jinx3Text: Riot registers as a Minion to the Damsel.
jinx4Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
jinx5Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Demon Info
firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon and show them the 'These are your Minions' info token and point to each Minion. Next, show them the 'These characters are not in play' info token, and show three good character tokens.

name: Deviant
ability: If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.

name: Devil's Advocate
firstNightReminder: Wake the Devil’s Advocate, they should point at any player.  Mark that player with the 'Survives Execution' reminder.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Devil’s Advocate, they should point at any player.  Mark that player with the 'Survives Execution' reminder.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
jinx1Text: Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Devil’s Advocate.

name: Dreamer
firstNightReminder: Wake the Dreamer and they should point at a player. Show them both that player’s character, and any character token of opposite starting alignment.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Dreamer and they should point at a player. Show them both that player’s character, and any character token of opposite starting alignment.
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

name: Empath
firstNightReminder: Wake the Empath, and show them fingers equaling the number of evil alive players neighboring the Empath.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Empath, and show them fingers equaling the number of evil alive players neighboring the Empath.
ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.

name: Engineer
firstNightReminder: Wake the Engineer and they either shake their head no, or point at either a Demon on their character sheet, or the appropriate number of Minions on their character sheet.  Wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' info token and the relevant character tokens.  Mark the Engineer with their 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Engineer and they either shake their head no, or point at either a Demon on their character sheet, or the appropriate number of Minions on their character sheet.  Wake the relevant players and show them the 'You are' info token and the relevant character tokens.  Mark the Engineer with their 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.
jinx1Text: Legion and the Engineer can not both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates Legion, most players (including all evil players) become Legion.
jinx2Text: Riot and the Engineer can not both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates Riot, the evil players become Riot.

name: Evil Twin
firstNightReminder: Wake both Twins.  Let them make eye contact. In turn, let each twin know who the other twin’s character token is.⬤
ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

name: Exorcist
otherNightReminder: Wake the Exorcist and they should point to any player (different to last night).  Put them to sleep.  If they chose the Demon, wake the Demon and show them the 'This character selected you' info token, then the Exorcist token.  The Demon does not wake again this night.
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Fang Gu
otherNightReminder: Wake the Fang Gu and they should point at a player.  The first time they choose an Outsider, the Fang Gu dies instead.  If this occurs, wake the chosen player.  Show them the 'You are' info token, then the Fang Gu token, then the 'You are' info token, then give a thumb down and mark the new Fang Gu with the 'Once' reminder token .⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
jinx1Text: If the Fang Gu chooses an Outsider and dies, the Scarlet Woman does not become the Fang Gu.

name: Farmer
otherNightReminder: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and wake them.  Show them the ‘You are’ info token and the Farmer character token.
ability: If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
jinx1Text: If Leviathan is in play & a Farmer dies by execution, a good player becomes a Farmer that night.
jinx2Text: If a Riot player nominates and kills a Farmer, the Farmer uses their ability tonight.

name: Fearmonger
firstNightReminder: Wake the Fearmonger and they should point at any player.  Mark that player with the 'Fear' reminder token. If this character was not previously selected, publicly announce that the Fearmonger has chosen a new player.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Fearmonger and they should point at any player.  Mark that player with the 'Fear' reminder token. If this character was not previously selected, publicly announce that the Fearmonger has chosen a new player.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player. If you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

name: Fisherman
ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help you win.

name: Flowergirl
otherNightReminder: Wake the Flowergirl and either shake your head no, or nod your head yes if the Demon voted that day.
ability: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
jinx2Text: If players' eyes were closed during the voting, the Flowergirl learns how many times the Demon voted.

name: Fool
ability: The first time you die, you don't.

name: Fortune Teller
firstNightReminder: Wake the Fortune Teller and they should point to any two players.  If either player is a demon or the Red Herring, nod your head yes. Otherwise, shake your head no.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Fortune Teller and they should point to any two players.  If either player is a demon or the Red Herring, nod your head yes. Otherwise, shake your head no.
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

name: Gambler
otherNightReminder: Wake the Gambler and they should point at any player, then at any character icon on their character sheet.  If the Gambler is incorrect, mark the Gambler as 'Dead'⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.
jinx1Text: If the Lycanthrope is alive and the Gambler kills themselves at night, no other players can die tonight.

name: Gangster
ability: Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbour, if your other alive neighbour agrees.

name: General
firstNightReminder: Wake the General and give them either a thumb up, thumb down or a wave of the hand to indicate who the Storyteller believes is currently winning, if either team.
otherNightReminder: Wake the General and give them either a thumb up, thumb down or a wave of the hand to indicate who the Storyteller believes is currently winning, if either team.
ability: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.

name: Goblin
ability: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.

name: Godfather
firstNightReminder: Wake the Godfather, show them the character tokens of all Outsiders in play.
otherNightReminder: If an Outsider was executed, wake the Godfather, they should point to a player, they die.
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [−1 or +1 Outsider]
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Golem
ability: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.
jinx1Text: If the Golem nominates Riot, the Riot player does not die.

name: Goon
ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

name: Gossip
otherNightReminder: If the Gossip made a true public statement today, someone dies.
ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

name: Grandmother
firstNightReminder: Wake the Grandmother and show them the character token marked 'Grandchild', then point at the Grandchild’s player.
otherNightReminder: If the grandchild died tonight, the Grandmother dies.
ability: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.
jinx1Text: If a Riot player nominates and kills the grandchild, the Grandmother dies too.

name: Gunslinger
ability: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.
jinx1Text: After the first vote, the Gunslinger may choose to point at a player.  If they voted, they are killed, otherwise, nothing happens.

name: Harlot
otherNightReminder: Wake the Harlot and they should point to a living player. Put the Harlot to sleep.  Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' info token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods yes or shakes their head no. Then, put that player to sleep. If they nodded yes, wake the Harlot again and show them the chosen player’s character token.  Decide whether both players die after this.
ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.

name: Heretic
ability: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.
jinx1Text: If the Lleech has poisoned the Heretic then the Lleech dies, the Heretic remains poisoned.
jinx2Text: A Pit-Hag can not create a Heretic.
jinx3Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
jinx4Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Huntsman
firstNightReminder: Wake the Huntsman and they either shake their head no, or point at a player.  If the chosen player is the Damsel, replace the Damsel token with a not-in-play Townsfolk. Either way, mark the Huntsman with their 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Huntsman and they either shake their head no, or point at a player.  If the chosen player is the Damsel, replace the Damsel token with a not-in-play Townsfolk. Either way, mark the Huntsman with their 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]
jinx1Text: If the Marionette thinks that they are the Huntsman, the Damsel was added.

name: Imp
otherNightReminder: Wake the Imp and they should point to a player. Mark that player as 'Dead'.  If the Imp chooses themselves, put the Imp to sleep, and choose an alive Minion.  Wake that Minion, show them the 'You are' info token, and then show them the Imp token.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

name: Innkeeper
otherNightReminder: Wake the Innkeeper and they should point to two players. Mark both as 'Safe' and one as 'Drunk'.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
jinx1Text: If Leviathan nominates and executes a player the Innkeeper chose, that player does not die.
jinx2Text: If a Riot player nominates an Innkeeper-protected-player, the Innkeeper-protected-player does not die.

name: Investigator
firstNightReminder: Wake the Investigator and point to the players marked 'Minion' and 'Wrong'. Show the Investigator the character token marked 'Minion'.
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
jinx1Text: Riot registers as a Minion to the Investigator.

name: Judge
ability: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

name: Juggler
otherNightReminder: Wake the Juggler and show fingers (1, 2, 3, etc.) equaling the number of correct guesses.
ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

name: King
firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon and point to the King and show them the King token.
otherNightReminder: If the Dead outnumber the living, wake the King and show them a character token of one of the alive players.
ability: Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.

name: Klutz
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

name: Legion
otherNightReminder: Choose a player and mark that player as 'Dead'.⬤
ability: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Leviathan
firstNightReminder: Publicly announce that the Leviathan is in play and that Day 1 is about to begin.  Mark the center of the Grimoire with the 'Day 1' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Publicly remind everyone that the Leviathan is in play and that the next day is about to begin.  Mark the center of the Grimoire with the appropriate reminder token.⬤
ability: If more than 1 good player is executed, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
jinx1Text: If Leviathan is in play & no execution occurs on day 5, good wins.
jinx2Text: If Leviathan nominates and executes the player the Monk chose, that player does not die.
jinx3Text: If Leviathan is in play & the Ravenkeeper dies by execution, they wake that night to use their ability.
jinx4Text: If Leviathan is in play & the Sage dies by execution, they wake that night to use their ability.
jinx5Text: If Leviathan nominates and executes the Soldier, the Soldier does not die.

name: Librarian
firstNightReminder: Wake the Librarian and point to the players marked 'Outsider' and 'Wrong' or shown them a zero if there are no Outsiders in play. Show the Librarian the character token marked 'Outsider'.
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

name: Lil' Monsta
firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil’ Monsta.
otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions together, and allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil’ Monsta.  Choose a player and mark that player as 'Dead'.⬤
ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*. [+1 Minion]
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
jinx2Text: The Marionette neighbors a Minion, not the Demon. The Marionette is not woken to choose who takes the Lil’ Monsta token.
jinx3Text: If the Poppy Grower is in play, Minions don’t wake together. They are woken one by one, until one of them chooses to take the Lil’ Monsta token.
jinx4Text: If there are 5 or more players alive and the player holding the Lil’ Monsta token dies, the Scarlet Woman is given the Lil’ Monsta token tonight.
jinx5Text: Votes for the Organ Grinder count if the Organ Grinder is babysitting Lil' Monsta.

name: Lleech
firstNightReminder: Wake the Lleech and they should point to a player. Place the 'Poisoned' reminder by that player.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Leech and they should point at a player. Mark that player as 'Dead'.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing an alive player: they are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.
jinx1Text: If the Mastermind is alive and Lleech’s host dies by execution, the Lleech lives but loses their ability.
jinx2Text: If the Slayer slays the Lleech’s host, the host dies.

name: Lunatic
firstNightReminder: Wake the Lunatic show them the 'These are your Minions' info token and point to the appropriate number of players.  These players do not need to really be Minions. Show them the 'These characters are not in play' info token, and show three good character tokens.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Lunatic and let them choose the appropriate number of players as if they were the Demon.⬤
ability: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
jinx1Text: The Mathematician learns if the Lunatic attacks a different player(s) than the real Demon attacked.

name: Lycanthrope
otherNightReminder: Wake the Lycanthrope and they should point to a player.  If that player is good, mark them as 'Dead'.  No other player can die tonight.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a living player: if good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.

name: Magician
ability: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.
jinx1Text: When the Spy sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician’s character tokens are removed.
jinx2Text: When the Widow sees the Grimoire, the Demon and Magician’s character tokens are removed.

name: Marionette
firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon and point to the Marionette and show them the Marionette token.
ability: You think you are a good character but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbour the Demon]
jinx1Text: When the Poppy Grower dies, the Demon learns the Marionette but the Marionette learns nothing.
jinx2Text: The Marionette learns 3 not-in-play characters when the Snitch dies, instead of at the start of the game.

name: Mastermind
ability: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

name: Mathematician
firstNightReminder: Wake the Mathematician and show fingers (1, 2, 3, etc.) equaling the number of 'Malfunctioned' reminders.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Mathematician and show fingers (1, 2, 3, etc.) equaling the number of 'Malfunctioned' reminders.
ability: Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

name: Matron
ability: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

name: Mayor
ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
jinx1Text: If the 3rd day begins with just three players alive, the players may choose (as a group) not to nominate at all. If so (and a Mayor is alive) the Mayor’s team wins.

name: Mezepheles
firstNightReminder: Determine the secret word of the Mezepheles. Wake them and show them this word.
otherNightReminder: If a good player says the secret word, wake them and show them the 'You are' info token and a thumb down to denote that they are now evil.  Mark Mezepheles with the 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.

name: Minion Info
firstNightReminder: Wake all minions. Allow them to make eye contact. Show each the 'This is the Demon' info token and point at the Demon.

name: Minstrel
ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.
jinx5Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Monk
otherNightReminder: Wake the Monk and they should point to a player. This player is now 'Safe'.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
jinx1Text: If a Riot player nominates the Monk-protected-player, the Monk-protected-player does not die.

name: Moonchild
otherNightReminder: If the Moonchild chose a good player, they die.
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

name: Mutant
ability: If you are 'mad' about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

name: Nightwatchman
firstNightReminder: Wake the Nightwatchman and they should either shake their head no, or point at player.  Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' info token and the Nightwatchman token, then point at the Nightwatchman. Mark the Nightwatchman with the 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Nightwatchman and they should either shake their head no, or point at player.  Wake that player, show the 'This character selected you' info token and the Nightwatchman token, then point at the Nightwatchman. Mark the Nightwatchman with the 'No Ability' reminder token.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.

name: No Dashii
otherNightReminder: Wake the No Dashii and they should choose a player.  That player dies.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.

name: Noble
firstNightReminder: Wake the Noble and point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.⬤
ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

name: Oracle
otherNightReminder: Wake the Oracle and show them fingers (1, 2, 3, etc.) equaling the number of dead evil players.
ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.
jinx1Text: Only 1 jinxed character can be in play.

name: Pacifist
ability: Executed good players might not die.
jinx1Text: Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Pacifist.

name: Philosopher
firstNightReminder: Wake the Philosopher and they should either shake their head no, or point at a Townsfolk or Outsider icon on their character sheet.  They become this character.  If that character is already in play, that player becomes drunk.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Philosopher and they should either shake their head no, or point at a Townsfolk or Outsider icon on their character sheet.  They become this character.  If that character is already in play, that player becomes drunk.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

name: Pit-Hag
otherNightReminder:
Wake the Pit-Hag and they should point at a player and a character on their character sheet.  If the chosen character is not in play, the chosen player becomes that character.  Put the Pit-Hag to sleep and wake the chosen player, and show them the 'You are' info token, then their new character token. Do remind them that their alignment did not change. 
If a Demon is created, remember to balance the game by choosing who the Demon(s) attack tonight.
ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
jinx1Text: A Pit-Hag can not create an evil Politician.
jinx2Text: If the Pit-Hag creates Riot, all evil players become Riot. If the Pit-Hag creates Riot after day 3, the game continues for one more day.

name: Pixie
firstNightReminder: Wake the Pixie and show them 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.⬤
ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.

name: Po
otherNightReminder: Wake the Po and they should either shake their head no, or point at one player.  That player dies.  If the Po said no, place the '3 Attacks' reminder by the Po token.  On the next night, they target three players instead of one.⬤
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

name: Poisoner
firstNightReminder: Wake the Poisoner and they should point to a player.  This player is now Poisoned.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Poisoner and they should point to a player.  This player is now Poisoned.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

name: Politician
ability: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

name: Poppy Grower
firstNightReminder: Skip the Wake the Minions step, and do not tell the Demon who their Minions are.  The Demon still learns their bluffs.
otherNightReminder:
Wake all minions.  Allow them to make eye contact. Show each the 'This is the Demon' info token and point out the Demon.  Put them to sleep.
Wake the Demon and show them the 'These are your Minions' info token and point to each Minion.
ability: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
jinx1Text: If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Spy does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.
jinx2Text: If the Poppy Grower is in play, the Widow does not see the Grimoire until the Poppy Grower dies.

name: Preacher
firstNightReminder: Wake the Preacher and they should point to a player. If the player is a Minion, wake them next and show them the 'This character selected you' info token and mark them with the 'At a Sermon' reminder token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Preacher and they should point to a player. If the player is a Minion, wake them next and show them the 'This character selected you' info token and mark them with the 'At a Sermon' reminder token.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
jinx1Text: Riot registers as a Minion to the Preacher.

name: Professor
otherNightReminder: Wake the Professor, they either shake their head no, or point to a dead player.  If the player is a Townsfolk, they are alive again.⬤
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

name: Psychopath
ability: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

name: Pukka
firstNightReminder: Wake the Pukka and they should point at any player.  That player is poisoned, and will die later.⬤
otherNightReminder: Mark the currently poisoned player as 'Dead'.  Wake the Pukka and they should point to a player.  That player is poisoned, and will die later.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

name: Puzzlemaster
ability: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

name: Ravenkeeper
otherNightReminder: If they died tonight, wake the Ravenkeeper and they should point to a player.  Show that player’s character token to the Ravenkeeper.
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
jinx1Text: If a Riot player nominates and kills the Ravenkeeper, the Ravenkeeper uses their ability tonight.

name: Recluse
ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

name: Riot
ability: Nominees die, but may nominate again immediately (on day 3, they must). After day 3, evil wins. [All Minions are Riot]
jinx1Text: If a Riot player nominates and kills a Sage, the Sage uses their ability tonight.
jinx2Text: If a good player nominates and kills the Saint, the Saint’s team loses.
jinx3Text: If the Snitch is in play, each Riot player gets an extra 3 bluffs.
jinx4Text: If a Riot player nominates the Soldier, the Soldier does not die.
jinx5Text: Riot registers as a Minion to the Town Crier.
jinx6Text: Players that die by nomination register as being executed to the Undertaker.

name: Sage
otherNightReminder: If the Sage was killed by a Demon, wake the Sage and point at two players, one who is the Demon that killed the Sage.
ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

name: Sailor
firstNightReminder: Wake the Sailor and they should point to a player. Put the 'Drunk' reminder by either the Sailor or the chosen player.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Sailor and they should point to a player. Put the 'Drunk' reminder by either the Sailor or the chosen player.⬤
ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

name: Saint
ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

name: Savant
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

name: Scapegoat
ability: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

name: Scarlet Woman
otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don’t count)

name: Seamstress
firstNightReminder: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
otherNightReminder: If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability: the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

name: Shabaloth
otherNightReminder:
You may replace one of the 'Dead' reminders with the 'Alive' reminder to resurrect one of the players killed the prior night.
Wake the Shabaloth and they should point at two players.  Those players die in that order.  Leave the 'Dead' reminders by them until the next day.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

name: Slayer
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

name: Snake Charmer
firstNightReminder: Wake the Snake Charmer and they should point at a player. If they point at the Demon, they become the Demon.  Show them the 'You are' info token, then a thumb down, then the 'You are' info token, then the Demon token.  Put them to sleep, and wake the new Snake Charmer, and show them the 'You are' info token, then a thumb up, then the 'You are' info token, then the Snake Charmer token.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Snake Charmer and they should point at a player. If they point at the Demon, they become the Demon.  Show them the 'You are' info token, then a thumb down, then the 'You are' info token, then the Demon token.  Put them to sleep, and wake the new Snake Charmer, and show them the 'You are' info token, then a thumb up, then the 'You are' info token, then the Snake Charmer token.⬤
ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

name: Snitch
firstNightReminder: After Minion info wake each Minion and show them three not-in-play character tokens. These may be the same or different to each other and the ones shown to the Demon.
ability: Minions start knowing 3 not-in-play characters.

name: Soldier
ability: You are safe from the Demon.

name: Spy
firstNightReminder: Wake the Spy and show them the Grimoire for as long as they need.  Then put the Spy to sleep.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Spy and show them the Grimoire for as long as they need.  Then put the Spy to sleep.
ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

name: Sweetheart
otherNightReminder: If the Sweetheart died today, mark a player as 'Drunk'.
ability: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

name: Tea Lady
ability: If both your alive neighbours are good, they can't die.

name: Thief
firstNightReminder: Wake the Thief and they should point to a player. This player now has a 'Negative Vote' in tomorrow’s voting.⬤
otherNightReminder: Wake the Thief and they should point to a player. This player now has a 'Negative Vote' in tomorrow’s voting.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

name: Tinker
otherNightReminder: The Tinker can die at this time.
ability: You might die at any time.

name: Town Crier
otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion nominated today. Place the 'Minion not nominated' marker (remove 'Minion nominated', if any).
ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

name: Traveler Info
firstNightReminder: Wake each traveler in turn.  Inform them of their alignment.  If evil, show them the 'This is the Demon' info token and point out the Demon.
otherNightReminder: Wake each new traveler in turn.  Inform them of their alignment.  If evil, show them the 'This is the Demon' info token and point out the Demon.

name: Undertaker
otherNightReminder: If someone was executed today, wake the Undertaker and show them the character token marked 'Died Today'.
ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

name: Vigormortis
otherNightReminder: Wake the Vigormortis and they should point at a player.  If the chosen player is a Minion, not only do they die, also put a 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player’s character token. Also choose a neighboring Townsfolk to the now dead Minion and place a 'Poisoned' reminder by the chosen Townsfolk’s character token.⬤
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [−1 Outsider]

name: Virgin
ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

name: Vortox
otherNightReminder: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

name: Voudon
ability: Only you and the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority is not required.

name: Washerwoman
firstNightReminder: Wake the Washerwoman and point to the players marked 'Townsfolk' and 'Wrong'.  Show the Washerwoman the character token marked 'Townsfolk'.
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

name: Widow
firstNightReminder:
Show the Grimoire to the Widow for as long as they need. The Widow points to a player. That player is poisoned. Place the 'Poisoned' reminder by that player.
Wake a good player. Show the ‘These characters are in play’ card, then the Widow character token. Mark them with the 'Knows' token.⬤
ability: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire and choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

name: Witch
firstNightReminder: Wake the Witch and they should point to a player. Place the 'Cursed' reminder by that player’s character token.⬤
otherNightReminder: If there are 4 or more players alive: Wake the Witch and they should point to a player. Place the 'Cursed' reminder by that player’s character token.⬤
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

name: Zombuul
otherNightReminder: If no one died today, wake the Zombuul and they should point to a player.  That player dies.⬤
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
